summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, authorizing agreements with Washington State Department of Social and Health Services for additional financial assistance under the Community Options Program Entry system (COPES) Program and the Medicaid Case Management Program, Personal Care and Nurse Oversight programs, creating certain positions, increasing the expenditure allowances in the 1995 Budget of the Department of Housing and Human Services, and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Health, Human Services, Education and Libraries
